author: jm
msg: add two features to core rule-parsing code; 1. optional behaviour to recurse through subdirs looking for .cf/.pre's, to support rules compilers working on rulesrc dir.  2. call back into invoking code on lint failure, so rule compiler can detect which rules exactly fail the lint check

author: jeremias
msg: Removed a method call that is not yet available in the repository. Sorry guys.

author: thorsten
msg: using lm directly instead of the cocoon match for contract resolving
